Comment: An Irish woman, who is here legally and has lived here for over 30 years, now sits in a massive privately owned ICE detention center.  (Honestly not sure what's happening with her disabled child at the moment, but I'm sure those pro life pro children pro family folks have that covered!  lol).  For drug posession charges that were expunged decades ago.  She was detained when she showed up with the paperwork to demonstrate that the case they were concerned about had been expunged.  Yet this is what happens when a Republican in power is accused of stealing millions of dollars from the most vulnerable.  Why are you okay with this, Republicans?  Shouldn't there at least be an investigation?
